attributes.action: Any politician who deliberately lies and misleads the public. Should be removed
attributes.background:
Many politicians blatantly lie and mislead the public, during elections and referendums. They should not be allowed to lie to and make promises they know they can't keep or have no intention of doing. 
MP's are public servants and paid to represent the people and dishonesty should not be accepted.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
